devStack.title: Development Stack
devStack.subtitle: There are some of the technologies I use for my projects.

about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! My name is Diego Garcia and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2020 when I decided to try creating my own websites about things, I like such as videogames or artists ‚Äî that taught me a lot about HTML & CSS!
about.description_2: Fast-forward to today, my main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a variety of clients.
about.subtitle: Education

1.title: Software Developer
1.description: I currently work as a Software Developer at SuperGiros, a financial services company. My job consists of creating and maintaining web applications for internal and external use, as well as creating and maintaining websites for the company.

2.title: Front-End Developer
2.description: I've been working as a freelance developer for over a year now, mostly for small businesses and organizations. I've worked on a wide range of projects for clients all over the world.

filmpassport.title: Film Passport
filmpassport.description: Film Passport is a web application that allows users to browse popular movies, search for movies, and add movies to their favorites list. Each movie has its own dedicated page with a description, trailer, and recommended similar movies.

bluebyte.title: Bluebyte
bluebyte.description: Bluebyte is an e-commerce website utilizing HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, React.js, React Hooks, Next.js, Sanity, and Stripe. The project features a functional shopping cart, a product quantity selector, and payments made through Stripe.

notewave.title: Notewave
notewave.description: Notewave is your go-to digital hub for capturing and sharing ideas effortlessly. Whether you're a creative thinker or meticulous planner, Notewave adapts to your unique style. It's a blend of organization and creativity designed to simplify your digital life, putting your ideas in the spotlight for the world to see.

todoapp.title: TaskQ
todoapp.description: TaskQ is a to-do list app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the LocalStorage API. It allows adding a deadline for each task and grouping them by date, making it an ideal tool for those who need to have a more detailed control of their pending tasks.

adviceMentor.title: Advice Mentor
adviceMentor.description: Advice Mentor is a simple advice generator app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It uses the Advice Slip JSON API to fetch random advice and displays it on the page

eden.title: Eden
eden.description: Eden is a community-driven chat application built to bring conversations to life in a vibrant virtual space. Connect with friends, share ideas, and explore a new realm of online communication. Join the EDEN experience today!

meta.title: Diego Garcia - Software Developer
meta.description: As a versatile Software Developer and Analyst, I bring a unique blend of technical proficiency and analytical insight to digital projects. Specializing in creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, I am dedicated to delivering seamless user experiences. With a keen eye for detail, I analyze software requirements, design efficient solutions, and implement robust code. Explore my portfolio to witness the intersection of creativity and functionality, showcasing my commitment to building innovative and user-centric web applications.
meta.keywords: Front-End Developer, Software Analyst, Software Developer, Web Developer, Web Designer, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Sanity, Stripe, Git, GitHub, Vercel, Freelance, Colombia, Node.js, Express.js
meta.author: Diego Garcia
